players.name: Bob
memory: You: " I'm concerned about Alice's death and want to know more about it."
Diana: "I'm innocent, I didn't do it. I was with Charlie the whole night."
Charlie: "I don't believe Diana's alibi, I think she was the one who killed Alice. We should investigate her further."
